Text: ABQ Uptown is an outdoor luxury shopping mall owned by Simon Property Group in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

<Text: ABQ Uptown:  It is one of four malls located in the Albuquerque area, and houses 46 different stores.>

Text: ABQ Uptown:  Its anchor tenants include J.Crew, The North Face, and Lush.
